verses.name: 2 Chronicles 31:10
verses.text: And Azariah the chief priest of the house of Zadok answered him, and said, Since the people began to bring the offerings into the house of the Lord, we have had enough to eat, and have left plenty: for the Lord hath blessed his people; and that which is left is this great store.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 31:11
verses.text: Then Hezekiah commanded to prepare chambers in the house of the Lord; and they prepared them,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 31:12
verses.text: And brought in the offerings and the tithes and the dedicated things faithfully: over which Cononiah the Levite was ruler, and Shimei his brother was the next.
